entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Colville Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:38 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 30 by morning. Wind chill minus 50 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 26.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late in the morning. High minus 26. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
